resources.string: HITECH GROUP began its operations from the City of Nawabs- Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh, India. Since then we are carrying out various residential and commercial projects to cater the needs and requirements of people at affordable rates along with excellent quality. The upcoming government projects are going to give a new dimension to the City of Nawabs-Lucknow. Lucknow will be a new blended hub of both culture and technology. This will result in mushrooming various job opportunities at each and every corner of this city thereby welcoming individuals from different regions to fulfill their dreams. Our company is determined to greet each of them with comfortable and affordable environment and providing healthy residential and profitable commercial spaces without compromising with the quality.
On the other hand, we denounce with righteous indignation and dislike men who are so beguiled .

HITECH GROUP began its operations from the City of Nawabs- Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh, India. Since then we are carrying out various residential and commercial projects to cater the needs and requirements of people at affordable rates along with excellent quality. The upcoming government projects are going to give a new dimension to the City of Nawabs-Lucknow. Lucknow will be a new blended hub of both culture and technology. This will result in mushrooming various job opportunities at each and every corner of this city thereby welcoming individuals from different regions to fulfill their dreams. Our company is determined to greet each of them with comfortable and affordable environment and providing healthy residential and profitable commercial spaces without compromising with the quality.

Our Basic philosphy is make to significant contribution to the development our contry. we aim to cater the need of each segment of the society.HITECH GROUP is strongly commited towards providing the strong infrastructure.Our Business is based on strong realties and this provide us ease to keep transperency with our clients Providing ehic living, working and shopping enviourment to the people give us delight and satisfaction.Our Group is strongly dedicated towards its corporate social responsibility.Lastly I want to thank all my associates and team members who are working with us fully determination, devotion and commitment.

Our Vision is not bounded just to the state but to be an international leading Real estate agent, and be the company of first choice amongst our clients to address their needs across all realty verticals. To fulfill growing aspirations of our customers by building world class and environment friendly real estate solutions and redefining the standards of life style by engaging ourselves in the business of Real Estate Development including development of land, constructing and marketing of the same, with an intention of serving the society and community in general
with the total dedication, commitment, with a focused purpose while maintaining the highest standards of excellence.

Our Mission is to establish long term healthy relationships with our clients, while offering an exceptionallevel of service and commitment to all their commercial, residential and industrial real estate needs.

HITECH GROUP began its operations from the City of Nawabs- Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh, India. Since then we are carrying out various residential and commercial projects to cater the needs and requirements of people at affordable rates along with excellent quality.
